attributes.action: THE GOVERNMENT TO CO-OPERATE WITH THE EGYPTIAN ARMY AND POLICE.
attributes.additional_details:
We Demand the Government to support the Egyptian Army and police to stop the killing and torturing.The Brotherhood started the Firing First

On the 14th of August 2013 , The Muslim Brotherhood attacked a police point in Kirdasa with an RPG killing all Officers inside and after the killing they "Slow Sliced" Them. One Officer was still alive and one of the brotherhood told him , " Your Still Alive you son of a Bit*h" finishing him with a rifle.

The Muslim Brotherhood kidnapped children and women and kept them in a mosque there till the police came and used them as shields so they would get shot.

In Rabaa El Adaweya the police found 30 Dead bodies under the stage. Also in Rabaa El Adaweya
Mosque the police also found a shared tomb.

We came to a point that if one of the brotherhood sneezed they say that the army blew pepper.

We Want the government to support the Army and police to stop the killing and torturing.
